chdsw.philips.com.haraldlib

Interface HBConnectionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HBConnectionListenerHandler

    public interface HBConnectionListener
    A callback to receive connection information from new connection request.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connected(java.lang.String deviceAddress, java.util.UUID primaryService)

      void connectFailed(java.lang.String deviceAddress, java.util.UUID primaryService)
      Connecting with the device has failed.
